page.title: 20A DOCTOR IN UTOXETER
page.content: Our doctor is married with two children.He likes cricket and rugby. He trained for eight years to become a G.P.He works in a private surgery with four other doctors and is paid by the government.They have approximately 12,500 patients on roll.He works about 55 hours a week.He spends about 5 hours a day in surgery and the rest on home visits.He thinks that with more knowledge people could treat themselves from the chemists.He deals mainly with colds and stress related problems.They store the records on paper and a small computor.He has a pay scale,an amount for each patient and a bonus.When he is out socially,and people tell him about their complaints.He deals with them by saying, "TAKE ALL YOUR CLOTHES OFF AND LETS HAVE A GOOD LOOK AT YOU!!!"
